version_description:
Version 1.3.2

New map, bigger and more detailed!
New trailer stork!
New system for adding skins!
Change headlight color.
Physics completely readjusted!
Overall game optimization.
Roulette with prizes!
Vehicle features: Suspend the axles of the trailer and truck, Hazard lights, Horn, Bus door sound, Brake sound, Arrows sound, New engine sounds.
Seat adjustment option.
Exhaust smoke.
Functional toll.
New car in traffic.
Save button.

General corrections.
